 2012-03642012-03-29,  TB,  NR,  CRA,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectClaude Montreuil Tax Remission Order
PrecisREMISSION ORDER which remits the debt with respect to the federal sales tax credit and the goods and services tax credit that were determined to be in excess of CLAUDE MONTREUIL's entitlements for the 1988, 1989, 1990 and 1991 taxation years.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2012-0022 Publication Date: 2012-04-11
AttachmentsAttachment
